top10_tweets_like: My most common piece of advice when reviewing a Shiny app: take non-reactive code out of your server and put it in its own function. Makes it so much easier to debug when something goes wrong in the depths of your Shiny app. See https://t.co/iabMn01ot2 for more details #rstats

Easy quick #rstats tip:  The relocate() function is new in dplyr 1.0.0+ and allows you to move columns of data easily and more intuitively than was possible using select() #r4ds #tidyverse #datascience #analytics https://t.co/e4Hh3VhzDa
